price: و فرمانرواییِ آسمان‌ها و زمین از آنِ الله است و بازگشت [همه] به سوی الله است.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa-ilā al-lahi al-maṣīru
